title: Software Engineer
description:
We are looking for experienced and passionate software engineers to work on user-facing and internal tools, providing high quality work products that drive our business. We are a team of energetic, motivated and restless tech enthusiasts that take on the challenge of empowering our customers and internal users. We do that by providing them with the necessary intuitive technologies through creating a wide range of software solutions.

This is a chance to be part of a rapidly growing team in a company that is changing the food delivery landscape, and be able to influence, execute and see the impact of your work at the end of the day. If you are an experienced software engineer with strong technical background and “get-things-done” attitude, we are looking for you!

For this role you 'll have to :

  • Design, implement and maintain complex, yet sophisticated and usable web and desktop applications
  • Test your code to assure quality of new and existing functionality
  • Work closely with Product Owners, Developers, DevOps engineers and Tech leads as part of an agile team, to meet and exceed the stakeholders’ expectations
  • Experiment with new frameworks and technologies and learn continuously.


Qualifications for this role include :

  • At least 3 years’ experience in full-stack development
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or equivalent topic
  • Excellent knowledge of at least one programming language (Javascript, PHP).
  • Knowledge of relational and non-relational database systems (e.g. MongoDB, Redis, PostGres)
  • Familiarity with SOLID principles and software design patterns
  • Experience consuming and developing REST APIs
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills in English
  • Self-motivation and a mentality for continuous learning.


Nice to have:

  • Comfort in TDD and other testing practices
  • Familiarity with at least one major cloud services provider (experience with AWS is a plus)
  • Knowledge of at least one scripting language (e.g. Python)
  • Experience working in an Agile team (Scrum/Kanban/XP)
  • Involvement with open source projects is a plus.


We offer :

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Career development opportunities


Your life @efood :

  • You will be a part of a fast-growing multinational company, member of the Delivery Hero holding, with the opportunity to acquire new skills and grow professionally.
  • Υou will have the opportunity to function in an established, yet creative and fun working environment with genuine and ambitious people whose ultimate goal is to maintain efood as the ideal workplace. [In our maiden participation in 2020, we were honoured with a 5th place award from the Great Place to Work® Institute]
  • Daily routine will be a thing of the past, as no day will be the same day as the one before.

title: Paid Social Campaign Manager
description:
efood’s Performance Marketing team is looking for a passionate Paid Social campaign manager that will focus on Facebook & Display advertising. If you are an A-player, want to get your hands dirty, wish to implement strategies that drive growth and always willing to learn, then efood is the right place for you!


What you’ll do:

  • End-to End-Campaign management: Set-up, launch, measure and optimize advertising campaigns on Facebook, Instagram, GDN, YouTube
  • Researching and testing new features, trends and ideas. Constantly challenging the status quo by identifying both new and improved execution strategies that will increase overall performance and efficiency, in turn leading to higher user satisfaction and retention.
  • Strategic Planning & Execution: Assist in the media strategy development with complete control of tactical execution of campaign.
  • Monitoring and challenging acquisition and order funnels in order to improve CVRs and performance of marketing campaigns.
  • Understanding of a creative’s impact in performance marketing and constantly working in a feedback loop with the design team.
  • Develop processes, best practices and automation that will help elevate campaign reach to the next level


What you have:

  • Deep expertise on Facebook ads with usage of both hard sell and soft sell objectives
  • Experience on Google ads, mostly with Display, Video and App advertising
  • Educated around User acquisition and Growth strategies in the digital world
  • Good understanding of CRM and email marketing fundamentals and their potential synergies with rest performance marketing channels
  • Experience with A/B Testing. Testing mindset: Test everything that matters
  • Deep knowledge of Analytics fundamentals and past experience with Google Analytics and Tag Manager
  • Understanding of how tracking works across platforms
  • A strong disposition for data-driven decision making; you like to play around with data and cut it in many different ways to find interesting insights that can help the business
  • Excel skills : know your way around pivot tables
  • Ability to manage and prioritize multiple projects at once
  • Team spirit that can work with multiple people from different backgrounds and expertise


Nice to have:

  • Bachelor/MSc in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics or Engineering
  • SQL / Python hands-on experience
  • Experience with Programmatic advertising
  • HTML / CSS basic understanding



We offer:

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons
  • Medical & Life Insurance
  • Career development opportunities


Your life @efood :

  • You will be a part of a fast-growing multinational company, member of the Delivery Hero holding, with the opportunity to acquire new skills and grow professionally.
  • Υou will have the opportunity to function in an established, yet creative and fun working environment with genuine and ambitious people whose ultimate goal is to maintain efood as the ideal workplace. [In our maiden participation in 2020, we were honoured with a 5th place award from the Great Place to Work® Institute]
  • Daily routine will be a thing of the past, as no day will be the same day as the one before.

title: Android Engineer
description:
We are in the unique position to experience new and interesting situations that many companies have never seen before. We bake challenges by using agile methodologies, top line tools and of course always working with the best of teams.

Are you an Android Engineer who has excellent problem solving skills and can overcome any technical challenges?


What you have to do day in day out

  • Build apps for phones and devices, making good use of all the latest APIs while maintaining support for older versions of Android.
  • Take part in designing and implementing new features from scratch.
  • Work with our Design and Analytics team to create pixel perfect, usable and data driven apps.
  • Track down and resolve issues.
  • Keep up with the latest SDK, tools and conventions.


Requirements


  • University and/or Postgraduate Degree in a relevant field
  • At least 2 years of professional experience in Android development
  • Released at least one Android App
  • Excellent knowledge of Kotlin and Java
  • Experience with one or more of the following architecture design patterns: MVP, MVVM, Clean architecture
  • Excellent problem-solving and learning ability
  • Holistic knowledge and passion for the platform
  • Experience in modern, distributed version control (we use Git and accompanying flows)
  • Superior analytical skills and a strong sense of urgency and ownership in your work
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills


Nice to have


  • Experience with the following: Retrofit, RxKotlin, EventBus, Dagger
  • Experience with Test Driven Development
  • Familiarity with integration/functional/UI Automation testing
  • Analytic tool experience and data driven culture
  • Experience with tracking tools (Firebase, Google tag manager, etc)


We offer

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Career development opportunities

  • You will be a part of a fast-growing multinational company, member of the Delivery Hero holding, with the opportunity to acquire new skills and grow professionally.

description:
We are in the unique position to experience new and interesting situations that many companies have never seen before. We bake challenges by using agile methodologies, top line tools and of course always working with the best of teams.

Are you an iOS Engineer who has excellent problem solving skills and can overcome any technical challenges?

  • Be involved with a variety of projects to extend and enhance our iOS app
  • Take part in designing and implementing projects that end up to successful Appstore deployment.

title: IT General Controls Specialist
description:
We are looking for an IT General Controls Specialist to join our Governance team in direct cooperation with our central Delivery Hero SE GRC team.

This is a chance to be part of a rapidly growing team in a company that is changing the food delivery landscape.

Will you join us?


Main duties:

  • Identify, assess, manage, mitigate, and monitor IT risks, in IT processes and company systems of our entities in Greece, Cyprus & Balkans
  • Design, update and broadcast IT general controls for the IT risks to be mitigated
  • Proactively plan and manage global ITGC rollouts/re-assessment, and issue reports to management
  • Drive Internal control system forward by analyzing and improving existing processes and frameworks
  • Implement control framework designed by Parent company,
  • Support IT related projects or stakeholders providing input to ensure early stage ITGC consideration.
  • Support external & Internal audits



Requirements:

  • Master and/ or bachelor’s degree in IT, Statistics or related areas
  • Minimum 4 years of professional experience in a major IT, Consulting company with a focus on IT systems or IT Audit, Big-4 experience will be considered as a plus
  • Process-oriented and problem-solving mentality
  • Excellent teamwork skills
  • Advanced MS Excel skills
  • Excellent use of English, written and oral communication skills,
  • Ability to adjust in an international environment


We offer

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Meal coupons

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
We are looking for an experienced and passionate engineer to combine software engineering and systems engineering skills in order to build and maintain reliable services. You will have to ensure that moving fast doesn’t mean sacrificing stability, quality, performance, or maintainability. Our ideal candidate must have the attitude and skill to automate as much as possible every process so as to satisfy our hungry customers. This is a chance to be part of a rapidly growing team in a company that is changing the delivery landscape, and be able to influence, execute and see the impact of your work at the end of the day.


What you’ll do:

  • Be an integral part of our service, actively contributing to the design and implementation of solutions on a day-to-day basis
  • Architect and develop solutions for highly resilient services
  • Develop automation to help deploy our services and maintain its operational health
  • Work in a high-paced environment, with different Agile teams and stakeholders
  • Be part of a small team, involved in the end-to-end delivery process
  • Participate in setting up and maintaining CI/CD for the release process
  • Design the infrastructure with the Security aspect in mind, implementing Security-by-design architectures
  • Own the overall monitoring and support of the infrastructure and services


What you have:

  • BSc in Computer Science, or equivalent area of a technical study
  • At least 3 years of working experience in a similar role
  • An engineering background with deep computer science fundamentals
  • Working experience with container orchestration and management technologies (eg. Docker, Kubernetes, EKS)
  • Background with the build-out of continuous integration and continuous delivery pipelines (CI/CD)
  • Hands-on experience with configuration and infrastructure management tools (eg. Terraform, Ansible)
  • Comfortable with any of the following programming languages Python or Golang
  • Good understanding of networking technologies: TCP/IP, UDP, DNS, Load Balancing, Routing, and Firewalling
  • Experience with any of the major Cloud vendors, preferably AWS
  • Experience in implementing and maintaining monitoring and alerting systems (eg. Prometheus stack, Grafana)
  • A strong team player attitude with excellent communication skills
  • Excellent verbal and written English communication


We offer:

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Career development opportunities

title: Quality Assurance Coach - Training Team
description:
We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic contestant to join our Training and Quality Team and contribute in all aspects of our Quality Assurance practices and processes. Your goal will be to promote corporate values and enhance the company’s quality processes and strategies.


What you'll do

  • Monitor closely and evaluate work quality and efficiency for our company's staff performance (incoming calls, live chat, incoming emails)
  • Coach our company's staff to fully understand the customer’s expectations and the way to achieve the highest level of customer experience and translate it to goals and objectives for the customer care agents
  • Coach new hires and existing company staff on raising their confidence levels and overall skillset, and ensure that they can fully implement change, complete the desired goals, and model of excellence
  • Identify areas for improvement based on feedback, make recommendations and propose solutions
  • Contribute to the overall success of our company by ensuring our team meets the department's goals and objectives
  • Maintain positive, consistent and effective communication with staff, peers and management


What you have

  • At least 1 year’s experience in Coaching/ Teaching experience is essential
  • Bachelor degree
  • Strong computer skills including Microsoft Office, QA applications and databases
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both Greek and English is a must
  • Previous work experience in a customer care or educational environment is a plus
  • Strong understanding of customer expectations with a focus on quality driven support
  • Attention to details, multitasking, accuracy, critical thinking and problem-solving powers
  • Ability to coach professionally, courteously and consistently
  • Good sense of responsibility, commitment to confidentiality and high levels of integrity
  • Team mentality, adaptability and solid time-management skills


We offer

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons

title: Compliance Specialist
description:
We are looking for a motivated person to join our Regional Legal team, focusing on Compliance issues in order to ensure that our organization complies with industry specifications, standards, regulations, and laws for Greece, Cyprus & the Balkans.

Your duties will include initiating compliance projects, developing and maintaining company policies and responding to policy violations. The ideal candidate will possess highly analytical and organizational skills and excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Your goal will be to ensure we operate in a compliant and ethical manner while meeting our global business objectives.

This is a chance to be part of a rapidly growing team in a company that is changing the food delivery landscape. You will be able to influence, execute and see the impact of your work at the end of the day.


Your mission

  • Aid in building a comprehensive compliance program and governance structure to ensure that the organization is compliant with relevant laws and standards.
  • Keep abreast of changes and developments in the regulatory environment.
  • Participate in departmental projects particularly in relation to the development of compliance.
  • Address ad-hoc compliance issues as appropriate, within the local compliance framework and support colleagues in understanding compliance-related risks.
  • Collaborate with the Compliance Manager on data privacy matters.
  • Work jointly with the Group Compliance team for drafting and revising company policies.


Our requirements

  • Bachelor’s Degree, preferably in legal or compliance.
  • Minimum 2 years of proven experience in Compliance or in a relevant role, preferably in a multinational environment - Big4 experience will be considered a distinct advantage.
  • Enhanced appreciation of the regulations applicable to the relevant business, particularly new and upcoming regulations in all applicable jurisdictions.
  • Excellent command of English (written and spoken) is essential.
  • Independent, goal-oriented and systematic way of working.
  • Attention to detail and ability to demonstrate an analytical mind.
  • Ambition to work in a dynamic, fast paced work environment, able to work with other team members.
  • Ability to manage priorities, work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.


We offer

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Career development opportunities

title: Dispatcher
description:
Are you a multitasker that loves coordinating operational tasks?

Our Dispatch team is growing and we are looking for our new superstars that will take our Logistics operations above and beyond.

As a Dispatcher you will monitor "delivered by efood" orders in real-time, making sure all works immaculately. You will lift any blockers on our riders' way to the PERFECT delivery!

Join us and be part of the new era in logistics!!

Responsibilities

  • Monitor orders and handle issues from the watchlist
  • Ensure that delivery zone performance and delays are on track.
  • Make corrective actions whenever needed (even before needed)
  • Handle incoming contact from vendors and riders through chat
  • Monitor order routing and make adjustments
  • Inform customers for their order status if and when needed.

Requirements

  • High level of multitasking
  • Problem-solving mindset
  • Attention to detail
  • Great communication skills
  • Excellent computer skills
  • Bachelor degree will be a plus
  • Experience in a similar industry or customer care field will be a plus
  • Excellent English verbal and written communication is a must
  • Ability to work in a rotating weekly schedule of day & night shifts from Monday - Sunday including national holidays

We offer

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Meal coupons
  • Career development opportunities

title: AML & Compliance Officer
description:
Delivery Hero is looking for an AML & Compliance Officer for its operations in Greece.

The AML & Compliance Officer will be responsible for the provision of services to the firm relating to Card Scheme Compliance, Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Sanctions, Oversight and management between Regulators and Financial Anti-Corruption Compliance.


Your mission:

  • Aiding in building a comprehensive compliance program and governance structure that is fit for purpose regarding all financial instruments in Greece as well as other European markets.
  • Being a strategic business partner providing assurance that business is being conducted in line with the ethical and legal international frameworks.
  • Executing and monitoring compliance programs in line with the firm's expectation.
  • Coordinating with central and local management and key stakeholders to ensure alignment with operational goals.
  • Working closely with Card Schemes and local regulators to ensure the company is suitably compliant and protected. This includes compliance with regulatory reporting requirements.
  • Coordinating audit, regulator and merchant inquiries and reviews relating to all financial compliance matters.
  • Getting involved in departmental projects particularly in relation to the development of compliance such as e-KYC.
  • Reviewing and rolling out relevant policies and procedures and identifying where local adjustments may be needed.
  • Initiating, conducting and promptly replying to ad-hoc compliance issues as appropriate and supporting colleagues in understanding compliance-related risks and management of such risks.
  • Keeping abreast of changes and developments in the relevant regulatory environment in all applicable jurisdictions.
  • Being able to demonstrate an ability to interpret Card Scheme, E-Money or regulatory requirements and assess operational Compliance with those requirements with particular focus on financial crime, anti-corruption and on-going reporting and compliance with the relevant standards.


Our requirements:

  • Bachelor’s Degree,in legal or compliance or a comparable field.
  • Minimum five (5) years of proven professional experience in Compliance or in a relevant role, preferably in a multinational environment. Big4, Banking or FinTech experience will be considered an asset.
  • Proven experience in overseeing compliance projects and assurance services (audit or similar) in the financial services industry.
  • Enhanced appreciation of the financial regulatory and governance environment (Proven experience in Fintech industry and strong Card Scheme knowledge will be considered an asset).
  • Independent, goal-oriented and systematic approach to work.
  • Excellent command of English (written and spoken) is essential.
  • Ability to work in a dynamic, fast paced work environment.
  • Ability to manage priorities, work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
  • Highest level of professional integrity and professional ethics.


We offer

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Career development opportunities

  • You will be a part of a fast-growing multinational company, member of the Delivery Hero holding, with the opportunity to acquire new skills and grow professionally.
  • Υou will have the opportunity to function in an established, yet creative and fun working environment with genuine and ambitious people whose ultimate goal is to maintain efood as the ideal workplace. title: Head of Risk Management
description:
Delivery Hero is looking for a Head of Risk Management for its operations in Greece.

The Head of Risk Management will be responsible for identifying and analyzing various risks (e.g. strategic, operational), developing risk management controls and contingency plans and communicating recommendations to entity’s and group’s management.


Your mission

  • Implementing the risk management system approved by the management, including leading practices, policies and regulatory requirements.
  • Performing risk assessment by analyzing the current risks and identifying potential risks that are affecting the entity.
  • Performing risk evaluation on entity’s handling of risks.
  • Reporting identified and assessed risks to the management.
  • Establishing the level of risk, the entity is willing to take (risk appetite).
  • Promoting risk culture and raise awareness within the entity.
  • Providing thought partnership, risk analytics (e.g. return on Risk Mitigation investments), and recommendations around remediation, risk mitigation, or process improvement to the local C-Level, management and risk owners.
  • Consulting and coordinate with other control-related functions (e.g. Internal Controls and Compliance).
  • Regularly reporting updates on risk management to the local management and Central Risk Management.
  • Establishing and maintaining relationships with the regulatory authorities.


Your skills

  • Bachelor’s Degree, preferably in Risk Management, Management or Business Studies, Finance or Economics.
  • Minimum five (5) years of proven professional experience in Risk Management or in a relevant role, preferably in a multinational environment. Big4 experience will be considered an asset.
  • Professional Risk Management certification will be considered an advantage.
  • Proven experience in risk management related projects in the financial services industry.
  • Enhanced appreciation of the financial regulatory and governance environment (Proven experience in Fintech industry and strong Card Scheme knowledge will be considered an asset).
  • Excellent command of English (written and spoken) is essential.
  • Independent, goal-oriented and systematic approach of work.
  • Ambition to work in a dynamic, fast paced work environment.
  • Ability to manage priorities, work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
  • Demonstrate integrity and professional ethics.


We offer

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons

  • Career development opportunities

title: Account Manager -Thessaloniki
description:
efood is looking to hire an experienced Account Manager to build and maintain solid relationships with partner restaurants. The Account Manager's responsibility is to identify opportunities for them and help them grow their business using efood’s services, features and campaigns. A successful Account Manager, should be able to analyze and use data to support clients in decision making. Ability to manage multiple accounts without compromising the quality of services provided is also a must.


Responsibilities :

  • Negotiating with clients and selling services for the fulfillment of each client's long-term goals
  • Developing a thorough understanding of clients' needs and requirements and preparing customized solutions to meet their objectives.
  • Compiling and monitoring reports on account progress, goals, and forecasts for account teams and stakeholders

Requirements :

  • Proven experience in Sales & Account Management
  • Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications as well as CRM software
  • Strong negotiation and leadership skills
  • Exceptional customer service skills
  • Excellent communication skills

title: Telesales Representative
description:
We are looking for an enthusiastic Telesales Representative to contribute in generating sales for our company. You will be responsible for closing sales deals over the phone and maintaining good customer relationships.

An effective telesales representative must be an excellent communicator and have superior people skills. They must be comfortable presenting products or services over the phone as well as dealing with complaints and doubts.

The goal is to help the company grow by bringing in customers and developing business.


For this role you 'll have to :

  • Contact potential or existing customers to inform them about a product or service using scripts
  • Answer questions about products or the company
  • Ask questions to understand customer requirements and close deals
  • Direct prospects to the field sales team when needed
  • Handle grievances to preserve the company’s reputation
  • Go the “extra mile” to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales
  • Keep records of calls and sales and note useful information


Qualifications for this role include :

  • Proven experience as telesales representative or other sales/customer role
  • Proven track record or successfully meeting sales quota preferably over the phone
  • Good knowledge of relevant computer programs (e.g. CRM software) and telephone systems
  • Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection
  • Team player
  • Patient and friendly personality
  • Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints
  • High school diploma required, BSc/BA will be a plus

  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Meal coupons

title: Riders Community & Onboarding Specialist
description:
We are looking for a Riders Community & Onboarding Specialist that will accelerate our riders’ onboarding experience and nurture the community's development needs.

You will be responsible for designing and facilitating pieces of training and learning materials (especially for new riders' onboarding), assessing community's needs for training and for elevating the fleet's development and engagement.


As a Riders Community & Onboarding Specialist, you will:

  • Design and deliver training courses (in-class and virtual classroom).
  • Manage the newcomers’ onboarding process.
  • Identify training needs by evaluating current and future trends, strengths and weaknesses.
  • Translate requirements into pieces of training in alignment with the fleet management team.
  • Assess onboarding effectiveness to ensure quality results.
  • Periodically evaluate ongoing programs to ensure that they reflect any changes
  • Initiate and lead various community engagement activities.
  • Identify areas for imporvement and turn them into development opportunities for the entire community.


To join us, you need:

  • Proven experience in delivering and designing training events and material.
  • Proven ability to handle the full training cycle
  • Ability to assess and analyze development and engagement needs of teams
  • Knowledge of training methods, tools and techniques
  • Ability to think out-of-the-box
  • Excellent time management and organisational skills
  • Engaging presentation skills
  • Proficiency in MS Office and in database software
  • BS degree in Education, Training, HR or related field

We offer

Competitive remuneration scheme

Private Medical & Life Insurance

Meal coupons

Career development opportunities


Your life @ efood

You will be a part of a fast-growing multinational company, member of the Delivery Hero holding, with the opportunity to acquire new skills and grow professionally.

You will have the opportunity to function in an established, yet creative environment with genuine and ambitious people whose ultimate goal is to maintain efood as the ideal workplace [In our maiden participation in 2020 we were honoured with a 5th place award from the Great Place to Work Institute]

Daily routine will be a thing of the past, as no day will be the same as the one before.

title: Customer Care Agent
description:
We are looking for someone who is customer oriented to deliver happiness to our customers (shifts: including day and night)! Are you enthusiastic? Energetic? Do you enjoy helping people and providing solutions? We are here to end world hunger and generate awesome brand love, thus we need someone with your skills to join our -great- cause!


You will be responsible for the communication with, both, our end users and partners, making sure that they receive the best customer experience.


Apply if:

  • You understand the difference between hungry and HANGRY
  • You can meditate even with the most hardcore rock music playing in the background
  • You will go straight to the restaurant and deliver the food yourself to our customers if you need to
  • The term "agent" doesn't only mean you're part of the FBI, CIA etc.
  • "Call Center" sounds like a "Happiest Land Ever Created" to you


Seriously though, apply if:

  • You have strong verbal and written communication skills in order to handle all our 3 channels: incoming calls, live chat and email.
  • You are problem solving oriented and you have the ability to find the best solution to every customer related issue.
  • You are a team player! Team spirit is necessary as you will be part of a highly interactive and dynamic team of customer care agents.
  • Multitasking and critical thinking are required in order to prioritize and handle both incoming and outgoing contact.
  • Strong understanding of customer expectations with a focus on quality driven support.
  • Fluency in Greek and English is a must.
  • Prior experience in customer service will be considered as a plus.
  • Bachelor's degree will be considered as a plus.
  • Full time work, 5 days a week, including weekends and national holidays.

title: Account Manager - Rhodes
description:
efood is looking to hire an experienced Account Manager to build and maintain solid relationships with partner restaurants. The Account Manager's responsibility is to identify opportunities for them and help them grow their business using efood’s services, features and campaigns. A successful Account Manager, should be able to analyze and use data to support clients in decision making. Ability to manage multiple accounts without compromising the quality of services provided is also a must.


Responsibilities :

  • Negotiating with clients and selling services for the fulfillment of each client's long-term goals
  • Developing a thorough understanding of clients' needs and requirements and preparing customized solutions to meet their objectives.
  • Compiling and monitoring reports on account progress, goals, and forecasts for account teams and stakeholders

Requirements :

  • Proven experience in Sales & Account Management
  • Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications as well as CRM software
  • Strong negotiation and leadership skills
  • Exceptional customer service skills
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Problem solving attitude
  • Ability to work independently without supervision

Nice to have :

  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration,Management, Sales, or related field
  • Understanding of marketing fundamentals
  • Interest in topics related to business and/or technology


We offer :

  • Competitive remuneration scheme
  • Meal coupons
  • Private Medical & Life Insurance
  • Career development opportunities
  • Company car
